Module BrickBreaker
Package breakout.core.entities.projectiles

Class GuidedProjectile

java.lang.Object
breakout.core.entities.Entity
breakout.core.entities.projectiles.Projectile
breakout.core.entities.projectiles.GuidedProjectile
All Implemented Interfaces:
Collidable, CollisionInitiable, DefaultDependenciesInjectable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Orb
public abstract class GuidedProjectile extends Projectile
Projectile that is capable of altering its path during flight to hit a target. The projectile is guided by an angle rather than static movement (up, down, left, right) although they can still be implemented.
